title: 3 Scientists Get Nobel Prize In Chemistry For Work On Protein Structures
content: Scientists David Baker, Demis Hassabis and John Jumper won the 2024 Nobel Prize in Chemistry, the award-giving body said on Wednesday.
summary: Scientists David Baker, Demis Hassabis and John Jumper won the 2024 Nobel Prize in Chemistry, the award-giving body said on Wednesday.

title: Did HBO Just Reveal Bitcoin Creator Satoshi Nakamoto's Real Identity?
content: Canadian developer Peter Todd is Satoshi Nakamoto, the mysterious creator of Bitcoin. No, we aren't saying it. It's award-winning filmmaker Cullen Hoback.
summary: Canadian developer Peter Todd is Satoshi Nakamoto, the mysterious creator of Bitcoin. No, we aren't saying it. It's award-winning filmmaker Cullen Hoback.

title: Antikythera: The Greece's Famed But Emptying Island
content: When the last national census was held in 2021, Antikythera had just 39 inhabitants, down from 120 in 2011.
summary: When the last national census was held in 2021, Antikythera had just 39 inhabitants, down from 120 in 2011.

title: Boy Who Killed 10 Testifies At Parents' Trial, Many Leave Court In Tears
content: The 13-year-old boy carried out the killings on May 3 last year using his father's gun. He cannot be prosecuted due to his age but his parents face serious public safety charges.
summary: The 13-year-old boy carried out the killings on May 3 last year using his father's gun. He cannot be prosecuted due to his age but his parents face serious public safety charges.

title: Mexican Mayor Went Alone To Out Of Town Meeting Before His Beheading
content: The gruesome act happened just days before new President Claudia Sheinbaum unveiled her security strategy aimed at combating violent crime.
summary: The gruesome act happened just days before new President Claudia Sheinbaum unveiled her security strategy aimed at combating violent crime.

title: Meta, Challenging OpenAI, Announces New Sound-To-Video AI Model
content: The announcement comes as Hollywood has been wrestling with how to harness generative AI video technology this year, after Microsoft-backed OpenAI in February first showed off how its product Sora could create feature film-like videos.
summary: The announcement comes as Hollywood has been wrestling with how to harness generative AI video technology this year, after Microsoft-backed OpenAI in February first showed off how its product Sora could create feature film-like videos.

title: Japan PM Shigeru Ishiba Dissolves Parliament Ahead of Snap Elections
content: By dissolving parliament now, Shigeru Ishiba wants to put his party to the test before his "honeymoon" period ends, a political science professor said.
summary: By dissolving parliament now, Shigeru Ishiba wants to put his party to the test before his "honeymoon" period ends, a political science professor said.

title: "Not True": Russia As Book Claims Trump Had "Private" Calls With Putin
content: In his book, US journalist Bob Woodward said Donald Trump ordered an aide away from his office so he could conduct a private phone call with Vladimir Putin.
summary: In his book, US journalist Bob Woodward said Donald Trump ordered an aide away from his office so he could conduct a private phone call with Vladimir Putin.

title: Nepal Teen Becomes Youngest To Climb All 14 Of World's 8,000 m Mountains
content: Nima Rinji Sherpa, who already holds multiple records from his ascents of dozens of peaks, started high-altitude climbing at the age of 16, by climbing Mount Manaslu in August 2022.
summary: Nima Rinji Sherpa, who already holds multiple records from his ascents of dozens of peaks, started high-altitude climbing at the age of 16, by climbing Mount Manaslu in August 2022.

title: Explained: What Is Climate Finance, Why It Is A Key Issue At COP29
content: Climate finance is money spent in a manner "consistent with a pathway towards low greenhouse gas emissions and climate-resilient development", as per phrasing used in the Paris agreement.
summary: Climate finance is money spent in a manner "consistent with a pathway towards low greenhouse gas emissions and climate-resilient development", as per phrasing used in the Paris agreement.

title: Opinion: Remembering Nicholas Roerich, The Russian Who Made Kullu His Home
content: Nicholas Roerich, who was born on this day 150 years ago, was first and foremost an Indophile, someone who perhaps can be said to have laid the foundation of Indo-Russian friendship.
summary: Nicholas Roerich, who was born on this day 150 years ago, was first and foremost an Indophile, someone who perhaps can be said to have laid the foundation of Indo-Russian friendship.

title: Explained: How Milton Became A Powerful Hurricane And Why It's A Concern
content: Milton's rapid power surge appears to be the latest example of a worrying trend, scientists said, with climate change not only fuelling more powerful storms, but doing so more quickly.
summary: Milton's rapid power surge appears to be the latest example of a worrying trend, scientists said, with climate change not only fuelling more powerful storms, but doing so more quickly.

title: Ocean Heat Behind Helene Made 500 Times More Likely By Climate Change
content: Climate change intensified Hurricane Helene's rainfall and winds, amplifying its devastation, a new rapid analysis found.
summary: Climate change intensified Hurricane Helene's rainfall and winds, amplifying its devastation, a new rapid analysis found.

title: North Korea To Permanently Shut Border With South Korea
content: North Korea's army said Wednesday it was moving to "permanently shut off and block the southern border" with Seoul and had informed the US military to prevent an accidental clash.
summary: North Korea's army said Wednesday it was moving to "permanently shut off and block the southern border" with Seoul and had informed the US military to prevent an accidental clash.

title: Europe Is Creating Its Own Moon At LUNA Facility. All About The Mission
content: This facility, located near Cologne, Germany, features 900 tons of crushed volcanic rock to mimic the lunar surface.
summary: This facility, located near Cologne, Germany, features 900 tons of crushed volcanic rock to mimic the lunar surface.

title: Australia Woman Kills Husband Over Affair, Chopped Body Found In Public Bin
content: Nirmeen Noufl allegedly murdered her husband and dismembered his body over a suspected love triangle
summary: Nirmeen Noufl allegedly murdered her husband and dismembered his body over a suspected love triangle

title: World's Highest Gamma Ray Telescope In Ladakh: Why It Is A Big Deal
content: The Major Atmospheric Cherenkov Experiment observatory, the largest imaging Cherenkov telescope in Asia, has been inaugurated at Hanle in Ladakh, giving a boost to scientific research.
summary: The Major Atmospheric Cherenkov Experiment observatory, the largest imaging Cherenkov telescope in Asia, has been inaugurated at Hanle in Ladakh, giving a boost to scientific research.

title: "Cheers": Kamala Harris Drinks Beer During TV Interview
content: In contrast to teetotalers Donald Trump and Joe Biden, Harris revealed on late night TV Tuesday that she likes the occasional brew.

title: Hurricane Milton Nears Florida, Biden Warns Of "Worst" Natural Disaster
content: Milton is the second huge hurricane in as many weeks to rumble toward Florida's west coast.

title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs Used Drug-Laced Lubricant To Assault Woman: Lawyer
content: The lawyer claimed her client began feeling increasingly weak after the lubricant was applied.
